title: DDFP 514: Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & Al Franken joins the show!
itunes:title: DDFP 514: Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & Al Franken joins the show!
description:
Shek is joined by Handsome Hank, Cynthia Frelund and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss some of the best play-by-play announcers of all-time and reveal their personal favorites. Also, some new "Dad Jokes" are shared by the guys and some loyal members of the Shek Republic. Then, EmmaVP transforms Studio 66 into roadside diner "Studio Route 66" and the crew reviews an entire menu of starters, main courses and desserts describing the biggest Week 14 games in this edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks. Plus, Senator Al Franken joins the show to talk about the Vikings' playoff chances, his transition into politics and who would win in a fight among the four NFC North mascots.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
